entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:55 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. Forecast issued 01:55 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 01:55 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
